So I work for a small resort Town 40 Kms from the city.  They call me the Townman, which I guess you can say is the Maintenance man.  I am the Public Works that wears many caps.  I look after the Fire Hall, on call during the day, maintain the roads, buildings and utilities, I'm even the Dog Catcher.  Part of my job is also garbage pickup on Tuesdays. Bags are tied and tagged and I throw them in the PU truck and haul it to the dump.  Its a good easy workout.  So far Ive had no complaints except one last Tuesday.  These new people moved in renting an old house, with their old Suburban with a wooden rear window and some old school bus parked in the back yard and several Dogs.  They are dirty looking and obviously on social assistance.  Ill say it, TRASH.  Well I get to their place and low and behold they got about a dozen Garbage bags.  I pick them up and out drops a small bag with Turd that broke opened.  They tried to pull one over.  Anyways I didnt want it in my truck or on the curb so I tossed back in their driveway.
